import React from "react"; import { Row, Col, Card, CardImg, CardText, CardBody, CardTitle, CardSubtitle, Button } from 'reactstrap'; const BookCardSaved = props => { return ( {props.title} Written by {props.authors}
View
{props.image !== "" && } {props.description} ) } export default BookCardSaved;
